title: VAI Platform: Invest in Our Digital Future

executive_summary.title: Invest in the Fenua's Digital Future
executive_summary.description: VAI Platform represents a unique opportunity for the citizens of French Polynesia to invest directly in the digital sovereignty of our most vital industry. The founder is contributing a fully operational technology platform valued at over 28 million XPF, eliminating technical risk. We are seeking 47 million XPF to fund a realistic, comprehensive Year 1 operational plan designed for rapid growth and lasting local impact.

investment_offer.title: Our Offer to the Investors of the Fenua

rows: In addition to the fixed 10% annual return, this bond gives you the opportunity to become a shareholder in VAI's future success. At a future qualifying event (e.g., a larger funding round), you will have the right to convert your investment into company shares at a discount.

market_context.title: Market Context
market_context.description: The Polynesian tourism sector generates 99 billion XPF annually but suffers from a massive economic bleed: the 4,500+ local operators lose 20-30% of their revenue to international platforms (Viator, GetYourGuide). This represents an annual leakage of 3-5 billion XPF.

vai_solution.title: The VAI Solution: Digital Sovereignty
vai_solution.description: VAI is not just a booking platform. It doesn't aim for competition with the global players. VAI is the **digital infrastructure for Polynesian tourism**, built locally, for locals:
points: Integrated Channel Manager: Centralized management of all sales channels (zero-costs)
100% Local: Profits are reinvested into the Polynesian economy

transactional_costs.title: Transactional & Payment Processing Costs
transactional_costs.note: These are variable costs directly tied to revenue, based on the Year 1 projection of processing 364,200,000 XPF in Gross Merchandise Volume (GMV) and executing 24,280 operator payouts.

rows: 1.8% fee on 364.2M XPF GMV. Stripe Connect enables international card payments, multi-currency support, and instant settlement—critical for serving global tourists.
~214 XPF per payout × 24,280 annual payouts. Routable automates 7-day operator payouts in XPF, eliminating manual bank transfers and ensuring our competitive payout promise.

technology.title: Technological Infrastructure
technology.note: This budget ensures a scalable, professional-grade infrastructure with redundancy, monitoring, and contingency support to mitigate technical risks.

rows: Supabase, Vercel, n8n. This budget allows for dedicated production and staging environments, automated daily backups, and the capacity to handle peak season traffic without performance degradation, ensuring a reliable experience for both operators and tourists.

Contingency fund to retain a freelance developer or agency on-demand for emergency bug fixes, security patches, and specialized tasks, mitigating the 'key person risk' and ensuring platform stability even when the founder is unavailable.

GitHub, software licenses, and essential monitoring services for real-time error tracking (e.g., Sentry) and uptime monitoring, allowing us to proactively identify and resolve issues before they impact users.
Fiber internet and mobile plans for the team

sections.title: Critical Success Factors
factors: The Technological Asset (28-44M XPF): Eliminates development risk and allows for an immediate start.
Institutional Endorsements: Moorea provides direct access to multiple operators; Tahiti Tourisme as a potential partner for national credibility.
The Disruptive Economic Model: 50% cheaper, 4-8x faster payments, and a free Channel Manager.
The Focused Team: Proven technical founder, a success manager for acquisition, and a marketing lead for growth.
The Execution Strategy: Phased rollout with focus on Moorea (Months 1-3) to Tahiti (Months 4-6) and consolidation (Months 7-9).
